original_text: “Take another scroll and write on it all the former words that were in the first scroll, which Jehoiakim the king of Judah has burned.
korean_text: 너는 다시 다른 두루마리를 가지고 유다의 여호야김 왕이 불사른 첫 두루마리의 모든 말을 기록하고

sentences.original_text: and write on it all the former words
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 이전의 모든 말을 기록하라

sentences.original_text: that were in the first scroll
which Jehoiakim the king of Judah has burned
